title: Chrysalis Acupuncture - White Bird Clinic
description: This service is for people wanting to stop substance abuse and is also available for people without substance issues who [...]
cleaned_text: This service is for people wanting to stop substance abuse and is also available for people without substance issues who want to use acupuncture for a wide range of medical issues. The treatment is provided by licensed acupuncturists in a group setting. It is available four days a week - Monday thru Thursday - on a walk-in basis; no appointment is necessary. Support, referral, and treatment for substance abuse and mental health issues are available on-site. Free for enrolled clients; $3-20 for community members. Contact Information Location: 350 E for community members and free for enrolled Chrysalis clients ADA Accessible: Yes Appointment: No
